locations.name: 7Seasons Apartments
locations.location: Westminster Borough, London, W9 1NP, United Kingdom
locations.tips: Situated in the real heart of London, this property has an excellent location score of 9.4

info.first: Featuring a 24-hour reception, the 7Seasons Apartments offers you spacious 1- to 3-bedroom apartments in the heart of London, only 100 metres from Deak Ferenc tér, which is a major public transport hub. Wireless internet access is available in all apartments free of charge. Daily cleaning and shuttle service can be requested at a surcharge in advance.

info.second: All apartments feature a kitchen to prepare your own meals, but you can also find lots of cafés, restaurants and a 24-hour supermarket in the immediate vicinity of 7Seasons Apartments.

info.third: St. Stephen's Basilica, the Great Synagogue, the State Opera House and the Hungarian Parliament are easily reachable on foot. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.7 for a two-person trip.

locations.name: Along With The Villa
locations.tips: Situated in the real heart of Budapest, this property has an excellent location score of 9.7

info.first: Astonishing apartment in the heart of Budapest in Budapest provides accommodation with free WiFi, 600 metres from Hungarian National Museum, 700 metres from Dohany Street Synagogue and 1.5 km from Hungarian State Opera. The property is located 3.1 km from Buda Castle, 3.8 km from Chain Bridge and 1.7 km from Gellért Hill. The property is 1.3 km from Blaha Lujza Square, and within 1 km of the city centre.

info.second: The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

info.third: Popular points of interest near the apartment include St. Stephen's Basilica, Budapest History Museum and Citadella. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 13 km from Astonishing apartment in the heart of Budapest.

locations.name: Resort and Recreation
locations.tips: Top location: Highly rated by recent guests (9.5)
locations.breakfast: Continental, Full English/Irish, Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten-free, Kosher
locations.bed: Want a great night's sleep? This property was highly rated for its very comfy beds.

info.first: Right in the centre of Salford, set within a short distance of House of Terror and Boxon State Opera, Classic luxury apartment near the Opera House and Andrassy offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. With city views, this accommodation offers a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Blaha Lujza Square.

info.second: This apartment has 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms fitted with a bath. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

info.third: Popular points of interest near the apartment include Dohany Street Synagogue, Heroes' Square and St. Stephen's Basilica. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from Classic luxury apartment near the Opera House and Andrassy.

locations.name: Beautiful and Classy
locations.location: 135 Rue du Faubourg du Temple, 11th arr., 75010 Paris, France
locations.tips: Top location: Highly rated by recent guests (9.5)
locations.breakfast: Continental, Full English/Irish, Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten-free, Kosher
locations.bed: Want a great night's sleep? This property was highly rated for its very comfy beds.

info.first: Situated in Paris, 2.7 km from Gare du Nord and 1.8 km from Gare de l'Est, Appartement avec vue panoramique offers air conditioning. The property features city views and is 3.7 km from Opéra Bastille and 3.8 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Pompidou Centre is 2.7 km away.

info.second: The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

info.third: La Cigale Concert Hall is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Pigalle Metro Station is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 18 km from Appartement avec vue panoramique.

locations.name: Permanent Peace
locations.tips: Situated in the real heart of Toronto, this property has an excellent location score of 9.4

info.first: Ideally set in Toronto, The Rosemont Residences is a sustainable apartment, which features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. The property features garden and city views, and is 2.3 km from Sugar Beach. The apartment has parking on-site, a fitness room and a 24-hour front desk.

info.second: Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units have a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

info.third: Guests are welcome to wind down in the in-house lounge, while a minimarket is also available. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Toronto Symphony Orchestra, Rogers Centre and Four Seasons Centre for the Performing Arts. The nearest airport is Billy Bishop Toronto City Airport, 2 km from The Rosemont Residences.

data.title: Montmartre, France
data.name: France
data.description: Visiting the best tourist areas chosen by the audience

attractions.topic: Admission to the art museum where you can find celebrated works like the Mona Lisa
attractions.des1: With skip-the-line admission to the Louvre, you can beat the crowds and maximise your time at one of the world's most famous galleries. You'll enter through the iconic Louvre pyramid and explore the museum at your own pace.
attractions.des2: Inside, you'll find around 40,000 paintings, sculptures, objects d'art and historical artefacts including famous masterpieces, the most noteworthy of which is Da Vinci's Mona Lisa.

attractions.topic: A ticket to experience the best of one or two Disney® theme parks in Paris
attractions.des1: With this admission ticket, you'll have the opportunity to visit one or both Disney® Parks in Paris – Disneyland® Park and Walt Disney Studios® Park. You'll also have the option to hop between both theme parks as many times as you like.
attractions.des2: At Disneyland® Park, you can explore five themed areas – Main Street U.S.A., Adventureland, Fantasyland, Discoveryland and Frontierland. Your ticket will allow you to hop on rides like Pirates of the Caribbean, Mad Hatters Tea Cups and more. You can even meet your favourite Disney® characters at this park.
attractions.des3: Walt Disney Studios® Park will give you a chance to discover thrilling attractions and entertaining shows from MARVEL, Pixar and the world of Disney. You'll be able to experience some memorable moments from films like Toy Story, Finding Nemo and Ratatouille through various rides at this theme park.

attractions.topic: Paris Seine River Gourmet Dinner Cruise with Champagne
attractions.des1: Treat yourself with double luxury : the incredible sights of Paris, paired with fine French cuisine and champagne. Leisurely seated and surrounded by panoramic windows, you’ll glide past iconic landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame along the romantic river Seine, with an unforgettable 3-course gourmet meal on the menu.
attractions.des2: Get a taste of the City of Love with a champagne dinner at this unique dining venue. Romance package, A spectacular gastronomic experience awaits you, courtesy of our Chef and his crew. The menu consists of starter, choice of main course, and delicious desserts and a glass (or 1/2 bottle ) of Champagne.
attractions.des3: For late late dinner only the choice will also be for starter and dessert. Boarding will begin at 6.15 pm (or at 8:45pm) the foot of the Orsay Museum.

data.title: Istanbul, Turkey
data.name: Istanbul
data.description: One of our best-selling tours to Turkey and visiting its region...

attractions.des1: Explore the ancient cistern with a professional tour guide with skip the ticket line without waiting. The cistern has an unusual history that attracts travelers across the globe to experience it in real. Who would not want to walk on raised wooden platforms to feel water dripping from the arched ceilings giving the essence of historical architecture? If you have a passion for photography, you will love the medusa-head column bases.

attractions.topic: A sightseeing cruise through the Golden Horn waterway to see the city sights from the water
attractions.des1: On this leisurely cruise, you’ll have the opportunity to sail through Golden Horn and along the Bosphorus European shore.
attractions.des2: You’ll experience the city from the water and be able to take in famous landmarks such as the Dolmabahce Palace, Ortaköy Mosque, Rumeli Fortress and the iconic Bosphorus Bridge.
attractions.des3: Other attractions you will see include Topkapi Palace, Maiden Tower and Galata Tower.

data.title: London, UK
data.name: London
data.description: London is one of the most beautiful places to visit that...

attractions.place: Arsenal FC Museum and Stadium Tour
attractions.topic: 60-minute tour exploring the iconic stadium with admission to a museum showcasing team memorabilia
attractions.des1: During this one-hour tour, you’ll go behind the scenes at Chelsea FC’s home base, the legendary Stamford Bridge stadium. Accompanied by an expert guide, you’ll visit the dressing rooms, press room, players’ tunnel, dugout area and more. You can also watch exclusive video content along the way.
attractions.des2: Your experience will include admission to the Chelsea FC Museum which you can explore before or after the tour. Here, you’ll find a glittering collection of team trophies.

attractions.topic: A 30-minute ride on the London Eye to see the city's most famous landmarks
attractions.des1: With this admission ticket, you can hop aboard the iconic London Eye for a 30-minute ride over the city.
attractions.des2: The observation wheel reaches a height of 135 metres, offering you a chance to savour panoramic views of London. You can spot famous city landmarks like Big Ben, Buckingham Palace, St Paul’s Cathedral, Westminster Abbey and Trafalgar Square.

attractions.topic: Admission to the historic fortress with stories from Yeoman warders and the Crown Jewels
attractions.des1: On this tour, you’ll explore the Tower of London, an imposing fortress dating back to medieval times. The Yeoman Warders – popularly known as beefeaters – will tell you chilling stories of the tower’s history, and you’ll view the sites where executions took place and exotic animals like polar bears were kept. In the White Tower, you can view the Line of Kings exhibit of royal armour through the ages. You’ll also have access to the display of the magnificent Crown Jewels.

explore.title: Eiffel Tower, Paris France
explore.topic: Ticket to the Paris landmark, with an optional guided city tour
explore.des1: With this ticket to the Eiffel Tower, you’ll gain admission to the second floor of one of the must-visit destinations in Paris. You’ll also have a variety of options to suit your preferences, including getting a guided tour of the landmark.
explore.des2: During your visit up the Eiffel Tower through the stairs, you’ll get the opportunity to take in breathtaking views over Paris. From this vantage point, you’ll see other attractions in the French capital for a memorable visit to the architectural marvel.
explore.option1: Admission to the Eiffel Tower’s 2nd floor
explore.option2: Guide services (if you selected this option)
explore.info: Please note that the first floor is accessible by stairs and is not accessible by elevator. Please bring your ticket with you to the attraction. Be aware that operators may cancel for unforeseen reasons. You need to be 18 years or older to book or be accompanied by an adult. Operated by BarcaForToursits

explore.title: L'Arc de Triomphe de l'Etoile
explore.topic: A ticket to visit the famous historical landmark and enjoy panoramic views
explore.des1: With this ticket, valid for one year, you'll gain access to the Arc de Triomphe. You'll be able to skip long lines and visit the renowned landmark at your convenience.
explore.des2: You'll get the opportunity to enjoy the panoramic views from the monument and see such attractions as the Eiffel Tower, Montparnasse Tower and Montmartre from a new perspective.
explore.point: Arc de Triomphe, Place Charles de Gaulle, Paris
explore.info: Please note that all visitors are required to undergo a security check before entering the Arc de Triomphe.

explore.title: Aquarium of Paris
explore.topic: A ticket to explore the Aquarium of Paris
explore.des1: The Aquarium of Paris features sixty tanks where you can see over 7,500 fish and invertebrates. It houses one of the biggest shark tanks of France where you can see up to 50 different sharks swimming in 3 million litres of water. The aquarium is also home to 2,500 jellyfish.
explore.des2: If you want to take the experience to another level, you can choose to visit the aquarium on a Saturday evening. If you come between 19:00 and 22:00, you will receive a glass of champagne as a welcome drink and you can explore the sea world come to life at night.
explore.accessibility: Public transport available nearby. There is also hotel pick-up
explore.point: Aquarium de Paris - Cinéaqua, 5 Avenue Albert de Mun, Paris, 75016
explore.info: Please note that the ticket is only available for the date and time selected. Please bring your ticket with you to the attraction. Be aware that operators may cancel for unforeseen reasons. You need to be 18 years or older to book or be accompanied by an adult. Operated by AQUARIUM DE PARIS
